content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam Abbasi, the rental price of my apartment in Duisburg is non-negotiable. I want to rent it out for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm seeking the lowest price as a student and don't have an interest in a non-negotiable higher price. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
